alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 28 at 3:33AM MDT until June 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FAR NORTHEAST COLORADO FIRE WEATHER ZONES 242, 248, 250 AND 251... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 242, 248, 250 and 251. * Timing...Critical fire conditions will be possible from late Wednesday morning through early Wednesday evening. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have the potential to spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
